name: Blade To A Gun Fight
description:
Fight against your enemies with all that you have. While they may have powerful weapons, you have great strength.

DOWNLOAD IS CURRENTLY ONLY AVAILABLE.

Brackeys Jam literally stopped submissions right as I was uploading webgl.

Thank you webgl for being so god damn unreliable :)

Controls:

W,A,S,D & SHIFT - Movement

MOUSE 0 & MOUSE 1 - Fighting
